be.Balor.Importer

Class SubDirFileFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.Balor.Importer.SubDirFileFilter

  • public class SubDirFileFilter
extends Object
    Implements a FileFilter to return files matching a given pattern.
    It also can search all sub-directories by a recursive implementation.
    You can also use the Type to only search for DIRS.

    Example: 
     import be.Balor.Importer.SubDirFileFilter.Type;
 import be.Balor.Importer.SubDirFileFilter.PatternFilter;
 
 SubDirFileFilter filter = new SubDirFileFilter();
 List< File > files = filter.getFiles(new File(""),
                       filter.new PatternFilter(Type.ALL, ".java"),
                       true);
    Author:
    Lathanael (aka Philippe Leipold)

    • Method Detail

      • getFiles

        public final List<File> getFiles(File basedir,
                  FileFilter filter,
                  boolean recursive)
        Returns a List of all Dirs/Files depending on the filter. If recursive is set to true it will get dirs/files in sub-diretories too.
        Parameters:
        basedir -
        filter -
        recursive -
        Returns:
        A list of files and/or directories matching the input pattern
